name: Uncrowned
description:
Uncrowned is an age of sail adventure strategy game. Secure your colony and ready your ship to take on missions, trade, or pirate your people to success. As long as the crown does not take notice, you were meant to fail.

Begin with your small colony and a single ship
  • Interact with factions
  • Trade products in an ever changing economy
  • Protect merchants or loot them yourself
  • Grow your colony
  • Upgrade your buildings and ship

Enjoy an in depth combat system
  • Boarding simulation
  • Slow them down with chain
  • Destroy them with shot
  • Kill them all with grape

However you choose to venture in Uncrowneds vast ocean just remember to pay your taxes.

Uncrowned is a solo developed game. Feedback is appreciated and seen by me.
